preference: pension provision for employees (list of beneficiaries)
preference: pension provision for employees (amount of annuity or allowance per payment-interval)
preference: pension provision for employees (payment interval of annuity or allowance)
preference: pension provision for employees (investment type for payment)

risk.lawsuit.is-relevant.description: risk of pecuniary losses caused by lawsuits (option is relevant)

risk.revenue-loss-by-keyperson-illness.i.description: risk of revenue loss if keyperson is not fit to work for a longer time period (option is relevant)
